Did you know?

We provide budget estimates for venues to help you make an informed decision.

**Budget Estimate Includes:**

  * Venue Rental Costs
  * Food & Beverage Costs
  * Taxes and Other Fees



Our Spot Estimate tool helps plan for a budget that works best for you. Try it by pricing out a venue you like!

[Clyde's of Gallery PlaceWashington, DC | Washington DCFor classy sports enthusiasts and bar lovers alike, Clyde’s of Gallery Place is the perfect venue to celebrate tying the knot in style.Starting at **$3,520** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/3810/clydes-of-gallery-place/)

[Atlas Performing Arts CenterWashington, DC | Washington DCLocated in the heart of Washington DC’s historic and thriving H Street NE neighborhood, the Atlas is a uniquely restored 1930’s art deco movie theatre that holds a special place in the hearts and mindStarting at **$4,277** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/5409/atlas-performing-arts-center/)

[St. Joseph Catholic ChurchHerndon, VA | Washington DCLocated in the town of Herndon, the St. Joseph Catholic Church offers a beautiful Franciscan parish where you can say your “I do’s” or celebrate your union.Starting at **$4,578** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/9090/st-joseph-catholic-church/)

[The Mead Center for American TheaterWashington, DC | Washington DCNestled along the waterfront in the historic Southwest neighborhood of Washington, D.C.Starting at **$9,669** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/956/the-mead-center-for-american-theater/)

[MalmaisonWashington, DC | Washington DCFor the refined, yet modern, D.C. couple, Malmaison is the ideal wedding venue choice. Located on Washington D.Starting at **$10,817** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/4394/malmaison/)

[Provision No 14Washington, DC | Washington DCFrom the moment you enter Provision No. 14, be immersed into a restaurant that takes you on a journey through American history through the art of taste and design.Starting at **$7,918** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/13640/provision-no-14/)

[Rosewood Washington DCWashington, DC | Washington DCCelebrate your wedding day in the heights of luxury a top of Rosewood Hotel. Exclusive to guests of the hotel, the Rooftop Bar & Lounge is a highly coveted space for unforgettable private events.Starting at **$8,415** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/10330/rosewood-washington-dc/)

[The Whittemore HouseWashington, DC | Washington DCThe Whittemore House is one of Washington’s most historic and elegant mansions available for your wedding day.Starting at **$8,530** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/8777/the-whittemore-house/)

[Perry'sWashington, DC | Washington DCPerry's is Washington DC's finest Japanese inspired restaurant. This sweet site is wonderful to host your wedding day celebration.Starting at **$18,300** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/8850/perrys/)
